name: Gradual Decay(demo)
description:
Discover your haunting past as you battle with your own demons and try to escape the unstoppable fate of decay that lurks within you. 

You  play as Cole Mason, a brilliant mind with an unfortunate past. You experience his life and realise how poor choices ruined it, perhaps he was worthy of such a fate afterall. Try to explore the environments and understand the story behind them in this psychological horror game.

Make sure to review the  game after you play, enjoy!

Disclaimer:

There is a known bug in this demo where your screen displays weird solid colors instead of rendering the game, the solution is to go back to the main menu (esc->menu) and click continue, sorry for the inconvenience!
